name: Home (itch) (Momei Doumei)
description:
On a dark and stormy night, Jun finds herself back in her childhood home. As she ventures for answers, things take a spooky turn... Can she escape unscathed?

Game length: ~15-30 mins

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
Z to INTERACT and ACCEPT
X to CANCEL or REJECT

Credit to

Justin Kearin for the amazing soundtrack

Yanfly and Irina for RPGMaker Plugins

This game was a little project we did for the Narrative Jam #3 with only a 10 day deadline. I'm sorry the game feels a little rushed over with the story here and there >.< but we hope to go back and improve on it later! So consider this a little demo~
-Sincerely, Momo~
